tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I appreciate the prompt and effective care Dr. Bhargavi Arun provided for my son's fever, cold, cough, and rashes. Her thorough examination and thoughtful treatment plan quickly alleviated his symptoms. Grateful for her expertise and compassionate approach.

I am new to Hyderabad.  We don‚Äôt know where to go for quick consultation. I got Dr.Bhargavi Aruns hospital in Google and have been consulting her. Much satisfied with her treatment and friendliness.

I recommended her to my friends and colleagues also. 

Thank you Dr.Bhargavi Garu.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the words of appreciation.
Parent satisfaction and patient happiness is what we strive for because  ultimately you know what is best for your child....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently took my child to see Dr. Bhargavi, and I have to say, I was blown away by the level of care and friendliness we received. From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel welcome and comfortable. They were kind and patient, answering all of my questions and making sure my child felt at ease.

Dr. Bhargavi was equally impressive. She had a warm and friendly demeanor that immediately put us at ease. She took the time to listen to my concerns, and then she explained everything in a way that was easy for me to understand. She was patient with my child, answering all of their questions and making them feel comfortable.

*** ******** ** ** ********** ******* *** ************* ****** *** I trust completely with my kid's health. From the first moment I met her, I was impressed by her vast knowledge of medicine and her ability to explain complex medical concepts in a way that was easy for me to understand. She is always up-to-date with the latest medical research and treatments, and she approaches each patient with a thoughtful and thorough understanding of their individual health needs. I am consistently impressed by her ability to diagnose and treat a wide range of conditions with precision and care. Dr. Bhargavi's expertise, combined with her compassionate and attentive bedside manner, make her an exceptional doctor.

Throughout the visit, I could tell that Dr. Bhargavi truly cares about her patients. She went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed and that we left feeling satisfied with our visit. I feel lucky to have found such a caring and compassionate pediatrician for my child, and I would highly recommend Dr. Bhargavi to anyone looking for a friendly and skilled pediatrician.
reply_text:
Glad I could help you treating your child.
Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr Bhargavi Arun for my 2 yr old. The doctor was so friendly with the kid and provided the required medication. She was doing well post medication, suddenly after 4 days my daughter started complaining about the pain, we are not sure what to do. We reached out to Dr over the phone, Dr was so helpful in addressing the treatment over the phone and my daughter is doing well. We can't go wrong when it comes to kids'health, Dr Bhargavi Arun understands the pain of parents in such situations. My gratitude for helping us at the right time.
reply_text: Appreciate taking your time for writing this..thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr Bhargavi Arun for my son‚Äôs running nose n cough issues last month.She is some one who doesn‚Äôt go with immediate antibiotic medication as she believes in self healing with mild medication support, which is pocket friendly too.However, she is definitely a good listener and I really liked the way she treat kids with great patience and with full attention. 

We as parents will be highly satisfied with the methods of her treatments and I highly recommend to visit her clinic for problems.
reply_text: Glad to know you are happy with treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: After reading all the reviews we booked an appointment and went 5 minutes before time and then we had to wait for about half an hour,  and we got our kid vaccinated from her. And for the first I have seen such a ruthless  experience, * ******* * ***** **** **** ********** **** ****** **** *** *** **** ******** ********* my daughter started to for obvious reasons  and doctor madam was like take her out,  and we were literally  forced out within 2 minutes.after this experience I have lost faith in practo application as the reviews here are unauthentic.
reply_text:
Thank you for taking time in writing this.
Sorry for being little late which would rarely happen depending on abnormal traffic sometimes .
Even though your visit was for vaccination , I took enough time  before vaccination on clearing your doubts and  assessing the child  and I never rush to send parents out without addressing them properly.

And regarding telling the child to take out of cabin after vaccination was to divert her from the little pain what she has experienced with vaccination and I try my best to be gentle on every child as I am a mother too..

Just a little more communication from your side would have prevented this misunderstanding.





Thanks.

review: My daughter had nausea for a few days and was feeling sick and weak. We met Dr Bhargavi after reading great reviews on Practo. We discussed how my daughter was feeling and Doctor gave us a good listening ear. She prescribed good medication. She was thorough and followed up the next day to check if my daughter was feeling better and I told her that yes, as a matter of fact she was. She showed great care and empathy not only for my child but also for me, a very concerned parent. I strongly recommend Dr Bhargavi Arun. Not many doctors today really bother to get to the heart of the problem..they just want to quickly close the discussion and move on to the next patient. But Dr. Bhargavi is different- SHE TRULY CARES.
reply_text: Ms.sharmila thank u so much for your kind words..

All doctors are wrote their prescription like an RMP doctors without knowing the actual problem, some of the pediatricians told it is common problem in children's don't worry. But I knew it is not common prblm bcz very frequently he is suffering with the problem, at that time we visited Dr. Bhargavi madam she is taking care about my son and she taken as it's not a common problem. She don't write un necessary medicines. I think we r going under right treatment thanks madam. I strongly recommend this doctor, Best hospital in kphb

review: We consulted Dr. Bhargavi for my daughter who experienced sudden weight loss and other diabetic symptoms.  Based on the reports, she was diagnosed with ‚ÄúDiabetic Ketoacidosis‚Äù and we had to admit her in hospital as her condition was critical.  During the hospital stay, Dr Bhargavi continuously monitored the situation and engaged the duty doctor and nursing stuff throughout day and night until my daughter is out of critical condition.    Dr Bhargavi explained us methodically about the situation giving us hope on how to face her lifelong situation.  Her expertise, commitment and patience is commendable.
